items.sentence: You shouldn't have done that without first asking for permission to.
If you are reading this letter, it means that I am no longer living.
I still think it's unlikely we'll ever find somebody to replace Tom.
I think that I've found something you might be interested in seeing.
I called Mary's father and asked him for permission to ask Mary out.
Only a few of the students seemed interested in what Tom had to say.
On my way home, I fell asleep on the train and rode past my station.
What's the country with the highest population density in the world?
Tom invited all four of his grandparents to his graduation ceremony.
When two dice are thrown, what's the probability of getting a seven?
